---
title: "About Me"
---

I am a public health professional with training in AYUSH systems and a strong interest in **health research and data-driven evidence generation**.

My work focuses on:
- Analyzing clinical and population-level health data
- Supporting research through robust analysis and visualization
- Bridging traditional medicine research with modern public health methods

I am currently building a portfolio of health data analysis projects and exploring opportunities in research and applied public health analytics.
